messages.subject: RRe: Newbie with a question
messages.msgSnippet: The best thing about Alison McKee s book (From Homeschool to College and Work) is that she details exactly how they went about constructing a functional
messages.messageBody:
The best thing about Alison McKee's book (From Homeschool to College and
Work) is that she details exactly how they went about constructing a functional
document that colleges found useful and informative, entirely after the fact,
when their son suddenly changed his mind and wanted to head to college, thus
showing that it's possible, if stressful, to pull it together without clear
records.

Deborah in IL



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
